# Flutter Financial Lending App - LuyLeun Clone

This is a Flutter mobile development project that replicates the functionality of the LuyLeun financial lending application.

## Project Overview
- **Type**: Flutter Mobile Application
- **Domain**: Financial Technology (FinTech)
- **Primary Features**: Loan application, document upload, user authentication, repayment tracking
- **Target Platform**: Android & iOS

## Key Features to Implement
1. User Authentication (Login/Register)
2. Loan Application Process
3. Document Upload (ID, Job verification, Selfie)
4. Loan Dashboard & Management
5. Repayment Tracking
6. Credit Building Features
7. Flexible Repayment Options

## Development Guidelines
- Follow Flutter best practices and clean architecture
- Implement responsive design for various screen sizes
- Use modern state management (Provider/Riverpod/Bloc)
- Implement secure data handling for financial information
- Follow Material Design guidelines
- Ensure proper error handling and user feedback

## Security Considerations
- Implement secure authentication
- Encrypt sensitive data transmission
- Follow financial data protection standards
- Implement proper session management
